L

Level - Class in src
Class creates a level and controls the logic and questions provided.
Level(int) - Constructor for class src.Level
Constructor assigns a levelID, question list, and a name to the level.
LevelMenu - Class in src
Represents the level selection menu in the "Cosmic Quest: Stellar Treasures" game.
LevelMenu(Accounts) - Constructor for class src.LevelMenu
Constructs a LevelMenu instance, initializing the user interface with buttons for each game level and setting up action listeners.
LevelMenuSpecial - Class in src
The LevelMenuSpecial class provides a graphical interface for the instructors and the developers This page will have all the planets already unlocked which is a special feature uniques to the instructor and developer.
LevelMenuSpecial(Accounts) - Constructor for class src.LevelMenuSpecial
 
LevelProgress - Class in src
Class tracks level progress and implements methods to modify and obtain level information.
LevelProgress() - Constructor for class src.LevelProgress
Constructor builds the default progress for a new account (all levels locked, except the Sun, which is set to the current level, and all scores set to zero).
LevelProgress(JSONArray) - Constructor for class src.LevelProgress
Constructor takes in progress as input so that the getter and setter methods in this class can be applied to it.
login(String, String) - Method in class src.Accounts
Method logs user into their existing account, and updates the currently logged in user.
LoginForm - Class in src
The LoginForm class represents the login form for the "Cosmic Quest: Stellar Treasures" application.
LoginForm(Accounts) - Constructor for class src.LoginForm
Constructs a new LoginForm that is associated with the specified account database.
logout() - Method in class src.Accounts
Method logs out a user and sets the currently logged in user instance variable to null.
